00001 import sys
00002 import PlurkOAuth
00003 import json
00004 
00005 class PlurkAPI:
00006     def __init__(self, key = None, secret = None,
00007             access_token = None, access_secret = None):
00008         if not key or not secret:
00009             raise ValueError, "Both CONSUMER_KEY and CONSUMER_SECRET need to be specified"
00010         self._oauth = PlurkOAuth.PlurkOAuth(key, secret)
00011         self._authorized = False
00012         self._error = {'code' : 200, 'reason' : '', 'content': ''}
00013         self._content = ''
00014         if access_token and access_secret:
00015             self.authorize(access_token, access_secret)
00016 
00017     @classmethod
00018     def fromfile(cls, filename = "API.keys"):
00019         try: 
00020             file = open(filename, 'r+')
00021         except IOError:
00022             print "You need to put key/secret in API.keys"
00023             raise
00024         except:
00025             print "Unexpected error:", sys.exc_info()[0]
00026         else:
00027             data = json.load(file)
00028             file.close()
00029             if not data["CONSUMER_KEY"] or not data["CONSUMER_SECRET"]:
00030                 return cls()
00031             if data["ACCESS_TOKEN"] and data["ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET"]:
00032                 return cls(data["CONSUMER_KEY"], data["CONSUMER_SECRET"],
00033                     data["ACCESS_TOKEN"], data["ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET"])
00034             else:
00035                 return cls(data["CONSUMER_KEY"], data["CONSUMER_SECRET"])
00036 
00037     def is_authorized(self):
00038         return self._authorized
00039 
00040     def authorize(self, access_key = None, access_secret = None):
00041         self._oauth.authorize(access_key, access_secret)
00042         self._authorized = True
00043 
00044     def callAPI(self, path, options = None):
00045         self._error['code'], self._content, self._error['reason'] = self._oauth.request(
00046                 path, None, options)
00047         self._error['content'] = json.loads(self._content)
00048         if self._error['code'] != '200':
00049             return None
00050         return self._error['content']
00051 
00052     def error(self):
00053         return self._error
00054 
00055     def get_request_token(self):
00056         self._oauth.get_request_token()
00057         return {
00058             'key': self._oauth.oauth_token['oauth_token'],
00059             'secret': self._oauth.oauth_token['oauth_token_secret'],
00060         }
00061 
00062     def set_request_token(self, request_key, request_secret):
00063         self._oauth.oauth_token['oauth_token'] = request_key
00064         self._oauth.oauth_token['oauth_token_secret'] = request_secret
00065 
00066     def get_verifier_url(self):
00067         return self._oauth.get_verifier_url()
00068 
00069     def get_access_token(self, verifier):
00070         self._oauth.get_access_token(verifier)
00071         return {
00072             'key': self._oauth.oauth_token['oauth_token'],
00073             'secret': self._oauth.oauth_token['oauth_token_secret'],
00074         }
